text: Tom Hannegan (1970 - October 20, 2021) was an American businessman and politician. He was a Republican. Hannegan was elected to the Missouri House of Representatives from Missouri's 65th District in November 2016, and re-elected in 2018. Hannegan was openly gay. He was one of only two LGBT Republicans serving in the Missouri House of Representatives. Hannegan died in St. Charles, Missouri on October 20, 2021 from a stroke at the age of 51.Tom Hannegan passes away ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:American LGBT politicians Category:Gay men Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:1970 births Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Businesspeople from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Tom Hannegan
